description.text: This spell ensures privacy. Anyone looking into the area from outside sees only a dark, foggy mass. Darkvision cannot penetrate it. No sounds, no matter how loud, can escape the area, so nobody can eavesdrop from outside. Those inside can see out normally.

sections.Components: V, S, M (a sheet of lead, a piece of glass, a wad of cotton, and powdered chrysolite)
